title: The Decline of Grammar - statements except

content.prompt: All of the following statements are true of the first sentence of paragraph 2 EXCEPT:

choices.label: It alludes to the expertise of the speaker.
It contradicts the conclusion reached at the end of paragraph 1.
It provides one answer to the question raised at the beginning of the passage.
It enunciates one approach to the issue with which the passage is concerned.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
